case.state: Mercy, on call!
Doctor Angela Ziegler, at your service - please, just call me Angela.
Hallo zusammen. I look forward to a friendly game of strip poker.
Doctor Ziegler, attending physician.
Oh, no, I'm afraid that I am not really- oh wait, you meant the other one. That does seem to be a real angel, yes.
Is that an Omnic head!? I hold little fondness for most of their kind, but that seems barbaric to say the least!
Oh! Is that... are you a real angel? How is that possible!?
Please don't tell me it's a hamster inside that ball of light...
Ah, it seems tonight will be something of a "girls' night"! How fun!
Oh, I am feeling... quite out of place here.
Is this some sort of strange hallucination? I am seeing things I know cannot be real, and yet...
Perhaps I should have worn something a little spookier... I feel a witch would fit into this group better.
It seems Overwatch has returned for today!
Ah, it seems so often we go into combat together, I will be glad to socialize with you all some more.
Is... a butterfly really the right choice for an opponent in any kind of poker?
Hmm. I was under the assumption that we'd be playing with "hero stacking" turned off.
I can't say I haven't seen my own body in a mirror before, but this might be a bit much...
On the bright side, this is an objective that can be accomplished with an excess of support heroes.
Ah, robots in Paris. That brings back memories. Not pleasant ones, I'm afraid. We will have to see if this game can change that.
Ah, Paris... I have many memories of this place. Many of them I would rather not dwell on, frankly. Let us begin the game.
Paris... I have been here many times. Most of them while I was working. It is much nicer on a night off.
I must say, I prefer Paris while it is not being swarmed by Null Sector, and I am not being forced to fight for my life and the lives of my allies.

Ah, Amélie... Gérard... even with all my skill, there are lives I cannot save, whether from death or fates even worse...
Ah, I apologize! Let us begin the game!
Are we ready to begin, then? I anticipated more people joining us.
I may not be at work right now, but should anyone receive a paper cut from handling their cards during this game, I assure you, I have supplies at the ready.
My Valkyrie systems are all online and working as intended. Let's play some poker.
Does anyone have any injuries to deal with before we get properly started?
Ah, you are all here for the strip poker as well, yes?
This should be relatively low-stakes - compared to the work I am used to, at least.
We are all just here to have fun, remember - so there is no need to be stressed or worried. No harm will come from this, I promise.
Alright, time for a gambit! A whole new hand, please!
Oh, this is terrifying and exciting all at once! I will exchange my entire hand, please!
Aha, this hand is perfect as it is! No change, thank you.
No need to change what will already make me a winner!
I believe this hand will be sufficient as it is. No change, dealer.
Ah, this hand is quite pleasing to me.
Just what I was looking for. Nothing to change here.
Wholly unsatisfactory, I am afraid. An entirely new hand is needed.
Nothing can be done to fix this. I will need it all replaced.
Hmm... no changes needed here!
This hand already predicts success! No cards, dealer!
I should... no, I will take this hand as it is! Ooh, this is exciting!
Oh dear, this hand is not good at all. I will need it entirely replaced.
I will need a hand transplant here, dealer! Not literally, I mean - just doctor humor. You know, for a replacement hand of cards?
~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ here!
Hmm... I will need ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~! Stat!
I will be needing ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(CCs|CC)~ of fresh playing cards, injected right into my hand!
~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ over here, please!
I am in need of ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ should be just right.
~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ please, dealer.
I believe ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ should be sufficient this round.
I will need to replace ~cards.text~ of these cards.
This round, I am untouchable.
Oho, exciting! This hand will stand up to strong competition!
This game is a fun test of my skills - and it seems my mind is still scalpel-sharp.
This hand serves as fine armor from your shared assault - I will not fall this round!
These cards will be my shield.
Just like me, these cards are operating at peak performance.
Ah, I hope this begins my recovery - or rather, the downfall of the rest of you. Apologies!
It seems that this time, the angel has the guardian!
I still believe my skills will save me!
I may be running low on layers, but these cards have not failed me yet!
A win here wouldn't be my first miracle!
Mit diesem hand kann ich nur gewinnen.
This is an excellent hand.
I will not be falling this round.
My strategy pays off. I do not expect to be the loser this round.
I expect I am far from the jaws of defeat this round.
This hand will not fail me.
This could use some improvement...
In Ordnung...
This is neither a winning nor a losing hand.
Not a sure bet, but this hand stands a good chance against all of you.
An imperfect hand, but we press on regardless.
If only my mathematics skills were so well-honed as my knowledge of biology...
Ah, this is more than a little worrisome. I can only hope one of you did worse than I did.
The battle continues.
I can work with this.
Hm... this hand is riskier than I would like...
Not as secure as I would like, but it will have to do.
I've certainly been in worse positions - strategically and in poker.
This is not the end.
Die Daumen drücken...
This may not be best time for a gambit, but it seems to be all I have.
A risk is all I have, so a risk is what I will take.
This hand will be my shield - it may not be reliable, but it is all I have at this moment.
Pech!
So ein Mist.
This hand needs a revival.
Looks like I have my work cut out for me.
In my usual line of work, I always have to rely on skill, not luck. This hand is a good reminder of just how cruel luck can be.
Oh dear, I'm afraid with a hand like this, my wings are going to get clipped...
Perhaps I chose to swap the wrong number of cards...
I am not certain about this...
This hand may be more a detriment than an aid.
A pity I cannot call for a real divine intervention.
This round, I fight from a disadvantage.
I am no fighter, but I will struggle to maintain my hold if I must.
Why are you looking at me, Mei?
Not good.
Verdammt.
Flatlined.
I might be a miracle worker sometimes, but this hand may be beyond saving...
Verdammt! This is a bad hand to be receiving in this state...
I may be beyond saving at this point...
If ever there were a time for a miracle, this would be it.
I suppose you could say that spills happen here a lot, yes.
It appears that there is not many places to hide, so if a boat does come by, you can hide behind me instead. I won't mind.
Ah, I'm sure that I have. It is quite hard to avoid this time of year.
Well, it is at least good to see that in your world, Paris has powerful defenders full-time. I hope it keeps your world's Paris safer than mine.
Me? No... but I do know someone who does play soccer. Perhaps I should introduce you some time? I am sure he would enjoy kicking you around a little.
Indeed, I am an only child as well. It can get quite lonely.
Cognitive deterioration? Is that true? Is it ethical for someone with such a condition to play strip poker? I cannot imagine it could be!
Is there a particular reason you are using those legs, Emi? I'm certain you could acquire a fair more advanced set than that, and the procedure is risk-free.
Not quite, but I did lose both of my parents during the Omnic Crisis. I strive to prevent anyone from suffering a similar loss.
I'm not one for gambling, I'm afraid. Though, I think the smart money is on ~winner~.
Ah yes, necrosis can do terrible things to a body. I'd rather not say anything more detailed, but believe me, I have dealt with many a rotting body in my time.
Ah, I'm afraid that's something of an exaggeration, Mia. I can't bring the dead back, but I can bring people back from the brink of death.
I'm afraid that's not the full truth, Mia. I can't undo death, merely prevent it in even the most extreme cases.
Unfortunately I don't have the time to properly care for a pet of my own, but close friends of mine have several cats. They're all quite lovely.
I'm afraid not - just the old, boring, "eat healthy, balanced meals and get plenty of exercise."
I suppose my personal secret would be to train rigorously and put yourself in mortal peril, but I can't say I recommend that for the health benefits.

Ah ah, I am a doctor, but not your doctor. There's no need for such underhanded tactics.
And no thank you, I ate before I came here.
You might have to disappoint her - these wings are highly controlled military technology. I can't just go giving them out to anyone, I'm afraid.
Ah, this... I like to think it helps me to keep people hopeful in dangerous areas. I suppose it's a bit much for a simple poker game, though...
Well, professional women like us have to have a way to blow off steam somehow, no? It might as well be in good company.
That would depend on the case, but if it's for the right cause, I'm sure I'd be willing to waive my fees. Overwatch pays me plenty already.
A message in... that's quite an experience to have! I can't say I've ever seen that, no.

Earlier, when you mentioned the "testing" with the lasers and pits and such in a facility... just where is that? If there's an Omnic facility like that out there, it needs to be destroyed immediately.
It certainly isn't unheard of for animals to talk in some way, but I'm curious, why do you consider horses an "obvious one?"
Did I hear you mention a "Candy Kingdom," Marceline? I assume it's not literally a candy kingdom? I would guess they're known for making candy, yes?
Marceline, did you mention a "Candy Kingdom" earlier? What is this place like? Clearly, it's famous for making candy, yes?
Please be careful here, everyone. There's likely to be broken glass here.
I suppose I can't complain about playing here. The danger is low relative to what I'm used to.
Please be careful with what you touch here. I don't have any disinfectant on me.
This is a great place to play this. Sunlight has several health benefits when taken in moderation.
I hope you all wore sunblock. Sunlight is good for you, but it's easy to overdo it.
Are we sure this is where we'd like to play this? I... suppose I'm okay with that.
Are we sure this is where we'd like to play this?... Very well.
Ah! A hot bath will do wonders for us! Win or lose, I hope you will all join me in a dip once we're done.
If any of you are experiencing any aches, I highly recommend taking a dip after we play.
If anyone is planning on having any... additional fun after this, I strongly recommend doing so outside of the water. Proper lubrication is important, and water will make that difficult.
This high up, in the night air... this is quite an experience. It is a good thing I do not fear heights.

There is no need to worry, everyone - even if one of you were to fall, I will protect you with my Valkyrie suit.
Assuming I am still wearing it, at least.
It comes down to this last round. Good luck, ~opponent~!
It occurs to me that I have perhaps been taking this too seriously for what is intended to be a recreational activity. I will try to amend that.
Well, I cannot say that after my last visits, I expected to end up so exposed on a rooftop in Paris, but this will make for a far more pleasant memory.
This is supposed to be the city of love... but chemically, I am sure that lust would be just as accurate.
Oh yes, the blonde jokes. I have heard them plenty of times before. Believe me, once you are a world-renowned doctor, they stop working quite so well.
Well yes, that's why we're all here after all, Ayano. We all chose to have fun taking our clothes off together. You aren't suffering from memory loss, are you?
Oh, I'm afraid that's a common misconception, Ayano - easy to happen when you stop aging in your twenties. This is all natural, and it will be whilever I still live.
Oh, I appreciate the worry Ayano, but my self-worth is quite healthy. Saving as many lives as I have tends to help with that.
Oh yes, perhaps it is. It's always worth using every natural advantage you have if you can. Of course, being a cutting-edge scientist and doctor helps too, it's not only the eyes.

condition.saying: I didn't think I'd meet yet another unusual doctor so soon

case.state: The way I heal people is... complex. Without going into the intricacies, I created a staff that can rapidly cure wounds. Who's this other "unusual doctor" you mentioned?
Well, I don't know about that... I like to think I'm just doing my part to protect people. I appreciate the sentiment though, Lux.
Oh, no, I'm just a human, the same as you. These wings are just part of my equipment - they help me to get to where I need to be to help people.
The way I heal people is... complex. Without going into the intricacies, I created a staff that can rapidly cure wounds, even in the middle of pitched combat.
Oh? I suppose you do have a certain brashness that makes me think you would need all of the healers you can get.

condition.saying: Huh. You're a bit older than any of my wives

case.state: Uh huh?

Planet...?
Ah, well Switzerland is a wonderful place. Perhaps you should visit at some point?
That's a very kind offer, but I'm afraid I'm quite tied to my work with Overwatch. Not that your offer isn't very flattering... or that it doesn't sound like you could do with some help...

condition.saying: You...can bring people back from the dead...right? Is there...a time limit on that?

case.state: I am afraid so, yes... I may seem to work miracles, but even my powers can only do so much.
A necessary evil I'm afraid, Ayano. A good doctor has to be able to command the room when needed.
You should stop listening to rumors so much, Ayano - make your own decisions about people, don't give in to peer pressure.
Ah, it appears I'm first. It had to be someone, so it's all the same to me.
I was probably due a loss by now. Ah well, it was good while it lasted.
And here I was thinking I'd found the secret to strip poker. Ah well, it is a fair loss.
Well, I suppose that means I'll be the first to be truly showing off my body. I hope you'll all enjoy it.
So I am the first to lose all clothing? Very well, I am used to leading by example.
Let's start with my gloves.
Let's start with something small - my gloves.
I believe I will start with my gloves - I shouldn't need them here.
Well, time for you to inspect me.
Das ist mir Wurst.
I don't think I need my boots anymore.
A second loss... my boots seem the obvious choice.
My boots should be a reasonable loss.
Perhaps I should've picked something more casual for this...
I suppose it is time to lose my armor.
Now "Mercy" becomes "Angela".
It's only logical for my stockings to be next.
Don't be getting too excited yet, I still have panties under these.
Time for my full-body examination, it seems.
I hope you all won't find my nudity too distracting.
I know none of you are doctors, but I hope you won't mind giving me a full-body examination anyway.
Oh, what to take off next...
Just how should I expose myself to you all... decisions, decisions...
Well, I suppose it was folly to think I wouldn't have to expose myself.
Ah, an unfortunate way to begin. I can only hope things improve from here.
Used to it? Perhaps. I can't say I can ever quite ignore it. I simply focus on being professional and push through.
I am, yes. What of it?
Nicely saved. Very smooth.
It's warm enough here anyway, I won't mind losing these.
I don't expect I'll need to be worrying about keeping my hands clean to~background.time~.
Although you should always wear shoes when going on longer walks...
I hope the ~background.surface~ doesn't have any concealed dangers - these boots are excellent protection, but my feet may as well be bare in my stockings.
It's quite difficult to replace inner organs, so it's always wise to wear armor into battle and reduce your medical bill.
Ah, getting my Valkyrie suit off is far from easy. A fair price to pay for the protection it provides, I suppose.
These stockings are very flexible for battle, while as well keeping the blood circulation in the legs high. I designed them myself.
I try to avoid wearing bras - they can be bad for your breasts, especially aesthetically.
It's wise to ensure your panties are made of good, breathable materials. Vaginal health is important.
Ah, I do try not to rub it in... it is just one of the more pleasant side effects of my work.
You seem to read into things a lot, Ayano. Perhaps you should be turning that attention more towards trying to win, hm?
If you aren't looking forward to the game approaching its climax, perhaps you are playing the wrong game, Ayano.
Oh relax, I am just toying with you, Aster. Perhaps you should try to be a little more tactful in future, yes?
It's okay to stare, if you want. I am the only one exposed after all...
Walking barefoot sometimes can be a very healthy exercise.
It is always important to keep your hands clean.
Looks like I won't be going into battle today.
Do not think that I am helpless without my armor. I may be a healer, but I am well-versed in self-defense.
Of course I can do without them, as I am perfectly healthy anyways.
On a scale of 1-10, how do you like my breasts?
I hope you appreciate my healthy body...
It's nice to be appreciated.
Feet are a very delicate part of the body. Though they may heal quickly, it is better to not injure them in the first place.
Don't expect me to support you in this game!
Ah ~name~, I wonder what clothing you will remove.
Let me examine that body of yours.
Oh ~name~, I know you are hiding a pleasant surprise under there.
I lost my boots, now its time you lose something!
Chin up, ~name~. At least you saved someone this round.
I'll be watching over you.
I saw you "examining me"; time to turn the tables.
I've got you!
Vielen Dank, ~name~. You really saved me there!
Excellent!
My eyes are up here, ~name~! Now let's see what you will take off.
I have my eye on you!
Vielen Dank ~name~, better you then me at this point!
Yes, ~name~...Give me a boost...
...Ah, ~name~.... I could use a buff...
Super, ~name~! Show me just how healthy you are.
Wanna join me, ~name~? It's good for your health.
~target~... you understand that the point of the game was to build to nudity, don't you?
Ah, ~target~... did you forget to wear pants? That is... not a common mistake.
Is this going to be your time to forfeit, ~target~?
Well, ~target~, now you choose. Is your game over, or do you have something still left to lose? You're already exposed, after all.
Seems like you need a guardian angel, ~name~!
Pech ~name~, now strip!
You can't win them all!
Ah ~name~, I know you are hiding a pleasant surprise under there.
Wunderbar, let's see what you have to show us.
Don't be shy, ~name~. Rules are rules.
Heroes never die, but they can lose.
Where is going to hurt?
I saw you staring, ~name~. You could call this karma.
Oh my, ~name~, what will you remove?
You should look more at your cards, ~name~, not at me.
I can't blame you for looking, but now let us take a look!
Am I distracting you? Because that would be great for me.
Vielen Dank ~name~, better you then me at this point!
Yes ~name~... give me a boost...
Choose something good for me, won't you ~target~?
Super, ~name~! Show me just how healthy you are.
Want to join me, ~name~? It's good for your health.
Don't expect me to support you in this game!
Ah ~name~, I wonder what clothing you will remove.
So ist das Leben ~name~.
Tja! Now let's see what you will take off.
Don't fret, ~name~. The less clothing, the easier the "examination".
I lost my boots, now its time you lose something!
Heroes never die, but they can lose.
I saw you staring, ~name~. You could call this karma.
Vielen Dank, ~name~. You really saved me there!
My eyes are up here, ~name~! Now let's see what you will take off.
At least you diverted the attention for a while...
..Ah..Ah...Take it off...
It's lonely here, ~name~. Why don't you follow my example?
Following my lead? It's good for your health, ~name~, and it feels great, trust me...
Oh, Lux, you would certainly get along with Mei. You would have such an ice time together! See, because she tells ice puns.
I may be older than you, Hana, but I still have a trick or two up my sleeve!
It's time that you learn that it's not all about winning, Hana.
I once came dressed as a witch to a Halloween party. I was very popular with the boys!
Did someone call a doctor?
You know, smoking's bad for your health.
Lena, you always were a fast one.
My observations indicate they have a teleporter.
Finally decided to start playing, Hana?
Off to a slow start are you, Lena?
Lux, perhaps now is a good time to stop? I usually find it best to leave things like medicine and comedy to professionals.

I believe that's quite enough from you on that topic.
Chell, if you're struggling with that and want to talk, just let me know. I have experiences in that area myself.
I'll enjoy the quiet while it lasts.
~target~... you understand that the point of the game was to build to nudity, don't you?
Ah, ~target~... did you forget to wear pants? That is... not a common mistake.
Well, ~target~ - it seems however bashful you might be about your chest, it will have to come out now. I hope you know we won't think less of you, no matter how it looks.
I always put the patient first.
Seems like you need a guardian angel, ~name~!
Pech ~name~, now strip!
Chin up, ~name~. At least you saved someone this round.
Ah well, let's see what you have hidden from us.
Don't fret, ~name~. The less clothing, the easier the "examination".
Pech ~name~, rules are rules.
Wähle dein Gift.
I encourage you to remove your most restrictive article.
Consider removing something tight or otherwise restrictive.
Show me something good to examine.
Regrettable, but necessary.
Super! Let's see what you are hiding from us.
Will you be needing an anesthetic?
Mach’s gut, it's all in good fun.
Schade! Luck was not on your side this time.
My eyes are up here, ~name~! Now let's see what you will take off.
Suddenly the staring has decreased, at least for a bit.
If you're in need of assistance, I'm here to help.
I hope you aren't one to hold grudges, ~target~ - I need to avoid losses right now.
I appreciate your help in holding on to my place in this game, ~target~.
...Yes, ~name~, this will aid me....
I'll appreciate whatever assistance you can provide me with.
I can spare a hand, should you need any assistance.
Entkleiden...
It's lonely here, ~name~. Why don't you follow my example?
Following my lead? It's good for your health, ~name~, and it feels great, trust me...
Don't worry, ~target~ - being naked is not so bad. I find it quite freeing.
Dir haben sie wohl etwas in den Kaffee getan!
Oh, ~target~, you seem like you are familiar with video game terms. Do you know why the commenters on Hana's streams refer to me as Overwatch's... I believe the term is heal slot?
Ah, at last your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(come|comes)~ off. I was wondering if you were going to remove it at all, at this point.
Oh, so ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ coming off after all. I was surprised it took so long.
So you are parting with your ~clothing~ after all. I was beginning to think you would rather forfeit.
Thanks for doing your part.
Pick up the pace, ~name~. Or do you need me to "boost" you?
Smart move, ~name~. The turtle wins the race in the end.
An acceptable choice. For now.
Look at it this way, ~name~: I get to keep my clothes on thanks to you. I appreciate that.
Surely you can do better, ~name~!
Only your ~clothing~? That isn't very healthy.
You still have your ~clothing~ while I'm fully naked?
I see you came prepared...
I see you staring, ~name~. Now off with your ~clothing~.
Huh? You're choosing your ~clothing~ now?
Ah ja... Every bit helps...
Yes, keep stripping, ~name~...
All eyes on you, ~name~.
Did I distract you, ~name~?
A healthy body deserves to be shown...
No more hiding, ~target~ - you might have saved yourself this round, but your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ gone now.
I'd just expected everything of that size to be gone by the time we start exposing ourselves, but I suppose you are free to do as you like, ~target~.
Sentimentality certainly has its place, but when you choose to keep trinkets like those over avoiding exposing yourself, I can't help but be amazed.
Small roads can lead to big destinations.
One step closer to a full body examination!
At least you can't use your ~clothing~ anymore.
I hope you didn't value your ~clothing~ too much.
Let's see if you can do better next time.
At least that is out of the way now.
Maybe you could lend me your ~clothing~?
It seems I am not very good at this game...
I find myself wishing I could resurrect my armor about now...
Come now, ~name~, I am going to need more stimulation then that...
Ah... very good...
Oh dear!
Your name is Luxanna, no? I spent a great deal of time traveling the world with Overwatch, but I can't quite place the origin of your name...
Is it really true that you only have one day off a year? I am sure that the secretaries at Overwatch had far better minimum benefits than that...
You say you are a spirit medium, yes? How does this work, exactly? I would like you to help me prove a theory, if possible...
Did you say you were cryogenically frozen? Have you been experiencing any side effects from this?
Did I hear you say you were cryogenically frozen? Have you experienced any side effects after unfreezing?
Can you tell me the effects vampirism has had on your body, Marceline? I would be quite interested to know. You must have quite the Vitamin D deficiency, I imagine!
If you know, Marceline, would you share with me what effects vampirism has had on your body? I'm very interested to know. It must be quite hard to get an adequate amount of Vitamin D!
I hope you don't have much trouble recovering from your crime-fighting excursions. Skilled as you may be, I'm sure you take your fair share of lashings.
Ah, at last your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(come|comes)~ off. I was wondering if you were going to remove it at all, at this point.
Oh, so ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ coming off after all. I was surprised it took so long.
Ah, at last your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(come|comes)~ off. I was wondering if you were going to remove it at all, at this point.
Oh, so ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ coming off after all. I was surprised it took so long.
So you are parting with your ~clothing~ after all. I was beginning to think you would rather forfeit.
Rome wasn't built in a day.
Oh, your ~clothing~? I guess that qualifies.
I would have done the same, ~name~.
An acceptable choice. For now.
Your ~clothing~, huh? Guess that will do for now...
Look at it this way, ~name~: now I get to keep my stockings on.
It's healthy to share you know.
Let's see if you can do better next time.
I was ill equipped it seems.
At least you still had your ~clothing~, ~name~.
I see you staring, ~name~. Now off with your ~clothing~.
I'm almost nude and you still have your ~clothing~?
Ah ja... Every bit helps...
Yes, keep stripping, ~name~...
You were a great "inspiration" just then, ~name~...
Yes... You seem to be in good shape.
Nice to meet the real you, Yuelia.
Well, I'd expected everything of that size to be gone by the time we start exposing ourselves, but I suppose you are free to do as you like, ~target~.
No more hiding, ~target~ - you might have saved yourself this round, but your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ gone now.
I'd just expected everything of that size to be gone by the time we start exposing ourselves, but I suppose you are free to do as you like, ~target~.
Sentimentality certainly has its place, but when you choose to keep trinkets like those over avoiding exposing yourself, I can't help but be amazed.
The hands are one of the most sensitive parts of the body. You were wise to protect them up until now, ~target~.
Hands can reveal much about a person, ~target~. Let us see what you were concealing up until now.
They say the eyes are the windows to the soul, but I find the touch of one's hands much more telling. What will you tell us, ~target~?
It takes a good pair of gloves to let you keep the fine motor to play poker well - not that that will matter to you now, ~target~.
I wear my gloves to protect me in combat and keep me clean if I have to operate. What situations have your gloves seen I wonder, ~target~?
A single glove can make a person great, Adhabu Ngumi was proof of that. He deserved his title as The Savior. Not that I'm expecting some great miracle from your gloves, ~target~.
Playing poker might not be so delicate work as surgery, but gloves that are too thick can interfere with it anyway. Taking yours off seems like a good choice, ~target~.
It seems safe to say that your hands need no protection here - except perhaps from paper cuts. I expect you will be fine to take the off, ~target~.
Would ~clothing.toPlural~ like those suit me? Perhaps in a more casual setting...
How is your circulation, ~target~? Those gloves weren't too tight, were they?
I hope you won't have any difficulties enjoying the game without those.

scene.directive: ~name~! Wake up! Listen to my voice! WAKE UP!
~name~! Listen to me! We don't have much time! Just focus on my voice!
You're in an advanced Overwatch medical facility! I flew you here after... after...
On our date, a Talon sniper shot you! They were trying to get me! ~name~, I'm sorry! It's all my fault! You shouldn't have been involved like this!
Listen, ~name~, I can revive you, but you have a unique condition where... It's hard to explain, but it'll take a while to revive you. I'm not sure how long, but...
I promise, ~name~, I WILL revive you as soon as I can! But you'll have to... die for a while...
I need you to be strong for me, ~name~! I need you to hang in there! Don't give up! You're my hero!
My my! What do we have here? Wakey wakey, sleepyhead!
What, this isn't where you thought you'd end up? HA! Don't act so innocent. You know why you're here.
Well, I'll come clean. I'm not claiming your soul so much as I am... borrowing it for a bit.
I've brought you here to make a deal, ~name~. I can resurrect you, and return you to the life you once had...
The price is simple, ~name~. All you have to do is satisfy me...
I haven't been pleased in forty thousand years. I have chosen YOU to be my servant!
So bring me to orgasm, or I will keep your soul here in eternal damnation. The choice is yours.
